snippet.title: YARG Version 0.4 Guitar/Vocals Gameplay (Ghosts Again - Depeche Mode)
snippet.description:
This is the gameplay of a rhythm game in development by EliteAsian123 called Yet Another Rhythm Game (YARG) that's similar to Clone Hero/Phase Shift however with the Rock Band style and gameplay. Being the most prominent feature of having vocals like in the Rock Band games, Clone Hero/Phase Shift doesn't include only display lyrics as you play guitar, for example. I can't wait to see more from this and see what the future holds for this game. I hope you enjoy the gameplay and definitely check out the game!

YARG Discord: https://discord.gg/zhKB443v

YARG Github: https://github.com/EliteAsian123/YARG/releases

#YARG #YetAnotherRhythmGame #rhythmgame
